issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Clicking on the label does not give us " you were able to click label.Good!" message.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on Base UI tab.
6.Tap on the Views table row.
7.Tap on the Event Interactions table row.
8.Tap on the Click on me label in the box.

Actual result:
1.Clicking on the label does not give us " you were able to click label.Good!" message.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on 'click on me'should give me the message "you were able to click label.Good!" message.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: BaseUI-->Views-->event interaction:Clicking on the label does not give us " you were able to click label.Good!" message.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206010843
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v2012060201244
Iphone 4.3.5
iOS Version : 4.3.5

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
